data.trans_hint: Tòa nhà ở bờ sông bên trái.
data.en_hint: The building is on the left bank of the river.
data.content_game_1: The building is on the left bank of the river.
data.answer_en_hint: The building is on the left bank of the river.

data.trans_hint: Vợ tôi là người đứng phía bên tay phải của tôi.
data.en_hint: My wife is the woman standing to my right.
data.content_game_1: My wife is the woman standing to my right.
data.answer_en_hint: My wife is the woman standing to my right.

data.trans_hint: Cứ đi thẳng bạn sẽ tới quán cà phê.
data.en_hint: Go straight ahead and you will get to the coffee shop.
data.content_game_1: Go straight ahead and you will get to the coffee shop.
data.answer_en_hint: Go straight ahead and you will get to the coffee shop.

data.trans_hint: Nhà máy nằm ở phía Bắc thành phố.
data.en_hint: The factory is located in the North of the city.
data.content_game_1: The factory is located in the north of the city.
data.answer_en_hint: The factory is located in the north of the city.

data.trans_hint: Mặt trời lặn ở hướng Tây.
data.en_hint: The sun sets in the West.
data.content_game_1: The sun sets in the west.
data.answer_en_hint: The sun sets in the west.

data.trans_hint: Gió thổi hướng Nam rất mát.
data.en_hint: The wind from the south is cool.
data.content_game_1: The wind from the south is cool.
data.answer_en_hint: The wind from the south is cool.

data.trans_hint: Mặt trời mọc ở hướng Đông.
data.en_hint: The sun rises in the East.
data.content_game_1: The sun rises in the east.
data.answer_en_hint: The sun rises in the east.

data.trans: Đường thẳng đứng, phương thẳng đứng
data.trans_hint: Cấu trúc bằng thép sẽ được nâng lên thành phương thắng đứng.
data.en_hint: The steel structure will be raised to the vertical.
data.content_game_1: The steel structure will be raised to the vertical.
data.answer_en_hint: The steel structure will be raised to the vertical.

data.trans_hint: Xoay nó chậm rãi từ phương nằm ngang sang vị trí thẳng đứng.
data.en_hint: Rotate it slowly from the horizontal into a vertical position.
data.content_game_1: Rotate it slowly from the horizontal into a vertical position.
data.answer_en_hint: Rotate it slowly from the horizontal into a vertical position.

data.trans_hint: Cậu nên qua đường ở vạch qua đường.
data.en_hint: You should go across the street at the crosswalk.
data.content_game_1: You should go across the street at the crosswalk.
data.answer_en_hint: You should go across the street at the crosswalk.
